parameters.name: CommodityCode
parameters.description: The code of the resource, such as ecsRi and scu_bag. If this parameter is specified, the ProdCode parameter does not take effect for the request.

parameters.name: DeductedInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the deducted instance. If this parameter is not specified, the details of all instances are returned.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss format.

parameters.name: IncludeShare
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to query the resource plan usage of linked accounts. Valid values:

*   true: queries the resource plan usage of linked accounts.
*   false: does not query the resource plan usage of linked accounts.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance to query. If this parameter is not specified, the details of all used instances are returned.

parameters.name: InstanceSpec
parameters.description: The instance type of the instance.

parameters.name: LastToken
parameters.description: The token that is used to retrieve the next page of results. For the first query, set the value to null. For subsequent queries, set the value to the token that is obtained from the NextToken parameter.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 20. Maximum value: 300.

parameters.name: ProdCode
parameters.description: The code of the service. Example: ecs.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss format.
